task.title: Eclipse 3.4 - 4.4 Plugin Installation - The Update Site Method
task.shortdesc: Installation procedure for the Eclipse plugin in Eclipse 3.4 - 4.4 with the Update Site method.

step.cmd: Go to Help Install New Software... Available Software .
Press Add ... in the Available Software dialog.

Enter http://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/Eclipse/site.xmlhttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Author/Eclipse/site.xmlhttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Developer/Eclipse/site.xml into the Location field of the Add Site dialog.
Select the oXygen XML EditoroXygen XML AuthoroXygen XML Developer checkbox.
Press Next > and follow through the rest of the installation wizard.
Verify that is installed correctly by creating a new XML Project. Go to File New Other... and choose oXygen XML Editor oXygen XML Author oXygen XML Developer XML Project .
When prompted for a license key, enter the license information received in the registration email.
step.info: Note that if you already have a native version of installed on your computer, you will not be prompted for a license key for the Eclipse version. The existing license key will be used automatically.
